trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Charleston
There were no other sightings in Charleston on or around December 31st 2011
Summary: Observed 2 oval craft with constant Red lights flying in tandem going West to East.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile working at the above location, just happened to look up before going inside and observed 2 constant glowing Red spheres traveling in a West to East direction. Made no sound, had no flashing lights, had no Green or White lights, just a steady Red light. Objects were observed for about a minute till they went out of sight.Knew it was not a helicopter and never seen any type of aircraft like this.
